text: Roslyn ( ) is a village in Nassau County, New York, on the North Shore of Long Island. As of the United States 2020 Census, the village population was 2,988. Roslyn was once called Hempstead Harbor, but its name changed to Roslyn on September 7, 1844. ==References== ==Other websites== * Roslyn, New York * Pictures and Info on Roslyn's Historic Estates Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Roslyn, New York
